sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { createAppointment } from '../features/appointments/appointmentSlice' import '../index.css' function AppointmentForm() { const [text, setText] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(createAppointment({ text })) setText('') } return (
setText(e.target.value)} />
) } export default AppointmentForm
